pages.title: Soul Shards
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Soul Shards$() are a mechanic which make $(#033dfc)Mobs$() inside the Vault drop $(#033dfc)Soul Shards$(), which can be exchanged for $(#033dfc)Items$() inside the $(#033dfc)F7-Menu$() at varying costs.

pages.title: Shard Trading
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Shard Trading Menu$() (accessible by pressing F7 by default) allows you to use your accumulated $(#033dfc)Soul Shards$() which you can infinitely store inside a $(#033dfc)Shard Pouch$() to purchase goods from $(#033dfc)3 Offers$() displayed or a $(#033dfc)random Offer$().$(br)Purchasing one of the $(#033dfc)3 Options$() will reroll other offers (may have a desync, reopen menu to refresh).
